00058 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00059 #include <config.h>
00060 #include "l_softpipe_int.h"
00061 #include "l_mve.h"
00062 #include <Lcode/r_regalloc.h>
00063 
00064 /* memory pools for Softpipe_Op_Info structures and relative latency and
00065    operand ready times arrays */
00066 L_Alloc_Pool *Softpipe_Op_Info_pool = NULL;
00067 
00068 /*************************************************************************
00069                 Function Definitions
00070 *************************************************************************/
00071 
00072 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00073                      Softpipe_Op_Info structure routines
00074   ----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 
00076 /* The Softpipe_Op_Info structure is initialized before scheduling at each
00077    candidate II.  If lite = 1, don't initialize ru_info.  Lite = 1 is used
00078    for instructions that don't exist until after scheduling. */
00079 
00080 void
00081 Lpipe_init_op_info (SM_Oper * sm_op, int init_ready_time, int lite)
00082 {
00083   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info = SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO (sm_op->lcode_op);
00084 
00085   softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time = -1;
00086   softpipe_info->issue_time = -1;
00087   softpipe_info->issue_slot = -1;
00088   softpipe_info->stage = -1;
00089   softpipe_info->kernel_copy = -1;
00090   softpipe_info->prologue_stage = -1;
00091   softpipe_info->epilogue_stage = -1;
00092   softpipe_info->unrolled_iter_num = -1;
00093 
00094   softpipe_info->estart = -1;
00095   softpipe_info->lstart = -1;
00096   softpipe_info->slack = -1;
00097   softpipe_info->priority = IMPOSSIBLE_PRIORITY;
00098   softpipe_info->scheduled = 0;
00099   softpipe_info->ready_time = init_ready_time;
00100 }
00101 
00102 
00103 /* Create a Softpipe_Op_Info structure and return a pointer to it.  
00104    Initialize fields that don't need to be reinitialized for each 
00105    candidate II. */
00106 
00107 Softpipe_Op_Info *
00108 Lpipe_create_op_info ()
00109 {
00110   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info;
00111   int i;
00112 
00113   softpipe_info = (Softpipe_Op_Info *) L_alloc (Softpipe_Op_Info_pool);
00114   softpipe_info->home_block = -1;
00115   softpipe_info->loop_back_br = 0;
00116   softpipe_info->exit_cb = NULL;
00117   softpipe_info->exit_weight = -1.0;
00118   softpipe_info->branch_path_node = 0;
00119 
00120   softpipe_info->src_mve_info =
00121     (Lpipe_MVEInfo **) L_alloc (Lpipe_src_mve_pool);
00122   softpipe_info->pred_mve_info =
00123     (Lpipe_MVEInfo **) L_alloc (Lpipe_pred_mve_pool);
00124   softpipe_info->dest_mve_info =
00125     (Lpipe_MVEInfo **) L_alloc (Lpipe_dest_mve_pool);
00126 
00127   softpipe_info->isrc_mve_info = NULL;
00128 
00129   for (i = 0; i < L_max_src_operand; i++)
00130     softpipe_info->src_mve_info[i] = NULL;
00131   for (i = 0; i < L_max_pred_operand; i++)
00132     softpipe_info->pred_mve_info[i] = NULL;
00133   for (i = 0; i < L_max_dest_operand; i++)
00134     softpipe_info->dest_mve_info[i] = NULL;
00135 
00136   return (softpipe_info);
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void
00141 Lpipe_construct_op_info (SM_Cb * sm_cb, SM_Oper * loop_back_br,
00142                          int *num_oper, int *branch_count)
00143 {
00144   SM_Oper *sm_op;
00145   L_Oper *oper;
00146   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info;
00147   L_Flow *flow;
00148   int home_block = 0;
00149   *num_oper = 0;
00150   *branch_count = 0;
00151 
00152   /* Create scheduling info and mark home block and other info for oper */
00153   for (sm_op = sm_cb->first_serial_op; sm_op; sm_op = sm_op->next_serial_op)
00154     {
00155       oper = sm_op->lcode_op;
00156 
00157       /* Start and stop nodes will be created later. */
00158       if (oper->ext)
00159         continue;
00160 
00161       oper->ext = softpipe_info =
00162         (Softpipe_Op_Info *) Lpipe_create_op_info ();
00163       Lpipe_init_op_info (sm_op, -1, 0);
00164       softpipe_info->home_block = home_block;
00165       num_oper++;
00166 
00167       if (!L_cond_branch (oper) && !L_uncond_branch (oper))
00168         continue;
00169 
00170       /* next oper starts new basic block */
00171       home_block++;
00172       branch_count++;
00173 
00174       /* mark loop back branch and weight of exit */
00175       flow = L_find_flow_for_branch (sm_cb->lcode_cb, oper);
00176       if (sm_op == loop_back_br)
00177         {
00178           softpipe_info->loop_back_br = 1;
00179           /* L_cond_branch detects regular cond branches and
00180              predicated uncond branches. */
00181           if (L_cond_branch (oper) &&
00182               !L_EXTRACT_BIT_VAL (sm_cb->lcode_cb->flags,
00183                                   L_CB_HYPERBLOCK_NO_FALLTHRU))
00184             {
00185               if (!flow->next_flow)
00186                 {
00187                   DB_print_cb (sm_cb->lcode_cb);
00188                   DB_print_oper (oper);
00189                   L_punt ("Lpipe_construct_op_info: "
00190                           "Expected a fall-through flow");
00191                 }
00192               /* exit is fall through path for loop back branch */
00193               softpipe_info->exit_weight = flow->next_flow->weight;
00194               softpipe_info->exit_cb = flow->next_flow->dst_cb;
00195             }
00196           else
00197             {
00198               if (flow->next_flow)
00199                 L_punt ("Lpipe_construct_op_info: "
00200                         "Expected no fall-through flow");
00201               softpipe_info->exit_weight = 0.0;
00202               softpipe_info->exit_cb = NULL;
00203             }
00204         }
00205       else
00206         {
00207           softpipe_info->exit_weight = flow->weight;
00208           softpipe_info->exit_cb = L_find_branch_dest (oper);
00209         }
00210     }
00211 
00212   return;
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 /* Make a copy of the given Softpipe_Op_Info structure.  This is done
00217    when opers are copied for MVE and prologue/epilogue generation.  To
00218    save memory space and time, the structures pointed to by the
00219    Softpipe_Op_Info structure are NOT copied, but the pointer to them
00220    is.  Thus, only the sturctures pointed to by the Softpipe_Op_Info
00221    structures for the opers in the first copy of the kernel should
00222    ever be freed.  The structures pointed to by the Softpipe_Op_Info
00223    are all read only after the copying is done. */
00224 
00225 Softpipe_Op_Info *
00226 Lpipe_copy_op_info (Softpipe_Op_Info * softpipe_info)
00227 {
00228   Softpipe_Op_Info *new_info;
00229 
00230   new_info = (Softpipe_Op_Info *) L_alloc (Softpipe_Op_Info_pool);
00231   new_info->loop_back_br = softpipe_info->loop_back_br;
00232   new_info->branch_path_node = softpipe_info->branch_path_node;
00233   new_info->issue_time = softpipe_info->issue_time;
00234   new_info->intra_iter_issue_time = softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time;
00235   new_info->issue_slot = softpipe_info->issue_slot;
00236   new_info->kernel_copy = softpipe_info->kernel_copy;
00237   new_info->stage = softpipe_info->stage;
00238   new_info->prologue_stage = softpipe_info->prologue_stage;
00239   new_info->epilogue_stage = softpipe_info->epilogue_stage;
00240   new_info->home_block = softpipe_info->home_block;
00241   new_info->exit_weight = softpipe_info->exit_weight;
00242   new_info->exit_cb = softpipe_info->exit_cb;
00243   new_info->unrolled_iter_num = softpipe_info->unrolled_iter_num;
00244   new_info->src_mve_info = softpipe_info->src_mve_info;
00245   new_info->pred_mve_info = softpipe_info->pred_mve_info;
00246   new_info->dest_mve_info = softpipe_info->dest_mve_info;
00247   new_info->estart = softpipe_info->estart;
00248   new_info->lstart = softpipe_info->lstart;
00249   new_info->slack = softpipe_info->slack;
00250   new_info->priority = softpipe_info->priority;
00251   new_info->ready_time = softpipe_info->ready_time;
00252   new_info->scheduled = softpipe_info->scheduled;
00253   return (new_info);
00254 }
00255 
00256 
00257 void
00258 Lpipe_copy_sched_info (SM_Cb * sm_cb)
00259 {
00260   SM_Oper *sm_op;
00261   L_Oper *oper;
00262   L_Attr *attr_isl, *attr_stage;
00263   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info;
00264 
00265   /* In sm_op, the sched_cycle is normalized to 0, so this is not an 
00266      accurate number for issue time.  For example, if the first instruction
00267      is really issued in cycle 1, each instruction's sched_time will be 
00268      one cycle short. */
00269 
00270   for (sm_op = sm_cb->first_serial_op; sm_op; sm_op = sm_op->next_serial_op)
00271     {
00272       oper = sm_op->lcode_op;
00273       softpipe_info = SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO (oper);
00274 
00275       if (L_START_STOP_NODE (oper))
00276         continue;
00277 
00278       if (!(attr_stage = L_find_attr (oper->attr, "stage")))
00279         L_punt ("Lpipe_copy_sched_info: scheduled oper found with "
00280                 "no stage attribute.");
00281       softpipe_info->stage = attr_stage->field[0]->value.i;
00282 
00283       if ((attr_isl = L_find_attr (oper->attr, "isl")))
00284         softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time = attr_isl->field[0]->value.i +
00285           softpipe_info->stage * sm_cb->II;
00286       else if ((attr_isl = L_find_attr (oper->attr, "cycle")))
00287         softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time = attr_isl->field[0]->value.i;
00288       else
00289         L_punt ("Lpipe_copy_sched_info: scheduled oper found with "
00290                 "no isl or cycle attribute.");
00291 
00292       softpipe_info->issue_time = softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time;
00293       softpipe_info->issue_slot = sm_op->sched_slot;
00294     }
00295   return;
00296 }
00297 
00298 
00299 /* free Softpipe_Op_Info structure for each oper that has one in cb */
00300 void
00301 Lpipe_free_op_info (L_Cb * cb)
00302 {
00303   L_Oper *oper;
00304   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info;
00305 
00306   for (oper = cb->first_op; oper != NULL; oper = oper->next_op)
00307     {
00308       softpipe_info = SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO (oper);
00309       if (softpipe_info != NULL)
00310         {
00311           L_free (Softpipe_Op_Info_pool, softpipe_info);
00312           oper->ext = 0;
00313         }
00314     }
00315 }
00316 
00317 /* 20031119 SZU */
00318 /* free Softpipe_Op_Info structure for the oper */
00319 void
00320 Lpipe_free_oper_op_info (L_Oper * oper)
00321 {
00322   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info;
00323 
00324   softpipe_info = SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO (oper);
00325   if (softpipe_info != NULL)
00326     {
00327       if (softpipe_info->src_mve_info)
00328         L_free (Lpipe_src_mve_pool, softpipe_info->src_mve_info);
00329       if (softpipe_info->pred_mve_info)
00330         L_free (Lpipe_pred_mve_pool, softpipe_info->pred_mve_info);
00331       if (softpipe_info->dest_mve_info)
00332         L_free (Lpipe_dest_mve_pool, softpipe_info->dest_mve_info);
00333 
00334       L_free (Softpipe_Op_Info_pool, softpipe_info);
00335       oper->ext = 0;
00336     }
00337 }
00338 
00339 void
00340 Lpipe_print_cb_info (SM_Cb * sm_cb)
00341 {
00342   SM_Oper *sm_op;
00343 
00344   printf ("**** sm_cb %d\n", sm_cb->lcode_cb->id);
00345 
00346   for (sm_op = sm_cb->first_serial_op;
00347        sm_op != NULL; sm_op = sm_op->next_serial_op)
00348     Lpipe_print_op_info (sm_op);
00349 
00350   printf ("****\n");
00351 
00352   return;
00353 }
00354 
00355 void
00356 Lpipe_print_op_info (SM_Oper * sm_op)
00357 {
00358   Softpipe_Op_Info *softpipe_info = SOFTPIPE_OP_INFO (sm_op->lcode_op);
00359 
00360   printf ("** sm_op id %d\n", sm_op->lcode_op->id);
00361 
00362   if (softpipe_info == NULL)
00363     {
00364       printf ("No info\n");
00365       return;
00366     }
00367 
00368   printf ("intra_iter_issue_time %d, issue_time %d, issue_slot %d\n",
00369           softpipe_info->intra_iter_issue_time,
00370           softpipe_info->issue_time, softpipe_info->issue_slot);
00371 
00372   printf ("stage %d, epilogue_stage %d, prologue_stage %d\n",
00373           softpipe_info->stage,
00374           softpipe_info->prologue_stage, softpipe_info->epilogue_stage);
00375 
00376   printf ("kernel_copy %d, unrolled_iter_num %d\n",
00377           softpipe_info->kernel_copy, softpipe_info->unrolled_iter_num);
00378 
00379   printf ("estart %d, lstart %d, slack %d\n",
00380           softpipe_info->estart, softpipe_info->lstart, softpipe_info->slack);
00381 
00382   printf ("priority %d, scheduled %d, ready_time %d\n\n",
00383           softpipe_info->priority,
00384           softpipe_info->scheduled,
00385           softpipe_info->ready_time);
00386 
00387   return;
00388 }
